WorkItem.Description:
Hi, I have downloaded the latest version & installed.
But I have asp.net website & it contain several javascript files. I have tried all options to minify my js files (renaming to somename.yui.js etc) but nothing happens.

Is this tool work only for MVC project & not for simple asp.net wesite?

Comments.Message:
Work in MVC and regular web project.

In web site project the min file not auto add to solution.
